assist.title: Sentences parser
assist.description: Enter sentences and see how they will be parsed by NDX Tech. Each line will be processed as an individual sentence. Intents will not be executed on your instance.

debug_connection.title: Debug connection
debug_connection.description: Observe requests to the server and responses from the server in browser console.

events.title: Događaji
events.description: Fire an event on the event bus.
events.alert_event_type: Event type is a mandatory field

services.title: Usluge
services.description: The service dev tool allows you to call any available service in NDX Tech.
services.yaml_parameters: Parameters only available in YAML mode
services.accepts_target: This service accepts a target, for example: `entity_id: light.bed_light`
services.no_template_ui_support: The UI does not support templates, you can still use the YAML editor.

ui.no_service: No service selected, please select a service
ui.invalid_service: Selected service is invalid, please select a valid service
ui.no_target: This service requires a target, please select a target from the picker
ui.missing_required_field: This service requires field {key}, please enter a valid value for {key}

yaml.invalid_yaml: Service YAML contains syntax errors, please fix the syntax
yaml.no_service: No service defined, please define a service: key
yaml.invalid_service: Defined service is invalid, please provide a service in the format domain.service
yaml.no_target: This service requires a target, please define a target entity_id, device_id, or area_id under target: or data:
yaml.missing_required_field: This service requires field {key}, which must be provided under data:

states.title: Status
states.description1: Set the current state representation of an entity within NDX Tech.
states.description2: If the entity belongs to a device, there will be no actual communication with that device.

templates.title: Predlošci
templates.description: Templates are rendered using the Jinja2 template engine with some NDX Tech specific extensions.
templates.confirm_reset: Do you want to reset your current template back to the demo template?
templates.confirm_clear: Do you want to clear your current template?
templates.time: This template updates at the start of each minute.
templates.all_listeners: This template listens for all state changed events.
templates.no_listeners: This template does not listen for any events and will not update automatically.
templates.listeners: This template listens for the following state changed events:

issues.units_changed: The unit of this entity changed from ''{metadata_unit}'' to ''{state_unit}''.
issues.unsupported_state_class: The state class ''{state_class}'' of this entity is not supported.
issues.entity_not_recorded: This entity is excluded from being recorded.
issues.entity_no_longer_recorded: This entity is no longer being recorded.
issues.no_state: There is no state available for this entity.

no_support.title: Fix issue
no_support.info_text_1: Fixing this issue is not supported yet.

no_state.title: Entity has no state
no_state.info_text_1: This entity has no state at the moment, if this is an orphaned entity, you may want to delete the long term statistics of it from your database.
no_state.info_text_2: Do you want to permanently delete the long term statistics of {statistic_id} from your database?

entity_not_recorded.title: Entity not recorded
entity_not_recorded.info_text_1: State changes of this entity are not recorded, therefore, we cannot track long term statistics for it.
entity_not_recorded.info_text_2: You probably excluded this entity, or have just included some entities.
entity_not_recorded.info_text_3_link: See the recorder documentation for more information.

entity_no_longer_recorded.title: Entity no longer recorded
entity_no_longer_recorded.info_text_1: We have generated statistics for this entity in the past, but state changes of this entity are no longer recorded, therefore, we cannot track long term statistics for it anymore.
entity_no_longer_recorded.info_text_2: You probably excluded this entity, or have just included some entities.
entity_no_longer_recorded.info_text_3_link: See the recorder documentation for more information.

unsupported_state_class.title: Unsupported state class
unsupported_state_class.info_text_1: The state class of this entity, {state_class} is not supported.
unsupported_state_class.info_text_2: Statistics cannot be generated until this entity has a supported state class.
unsupported_state_class.info_text_3: If this state class was provided by an integration, this is a bug. Please report an issue.
unsupported_state_class.info_text_4: If you have set this state class yourself, please correct it.
unsupported_state_class.info_text_4_link: The different state classes and when to use which can be found in the developer documentation.
unsupported_state_class.info_text_5: If the state class has permanently changed, you may want to delete the long term statistics of it from your database.
unsupported_state_class.info_text_6: Do you want to permanently delete the long term statistics of {statistic_id} from your database?

units_changed.title: The unit of this entity changed
units_changed.update: Update the unit of the historic statistic values from ''{metadata_unit}'' to ''{state_unit}'', without converting.
units_changed.clear: Delete all old statistic data for this entity
units_changed.how_to_fix: How do you want to fix this issue?
units_changed.info_text_1: The unit of this entity changed to ''{current_unit}'' which can't be converted to the previously stored unit, ''{previous_unit}''.
units_changed.info_text_2: If the historic statistic values have a wrong unit, you can update the units of the old values. The values will not be updated.
units_changed.info_text_3: Otherwise you can choose to delete all historic statistic values, and start over.

adjust_sum.title: Adjust a statistic
adjust_sum.no_statistics_found: No statistics found for this period.
adjust_sum.info_text_1: Sometimes the statistics end up being incorrect for a specific point in time. This can mess up your beautiful graphs! Select a time below to find the bad moment and adjust the data.

validation.heading: Provjera konfiguracije
validation.introduction: Provjerite svoju konfiguraciju ako ste nedavno napravili neke promjene u konfiguraciji i želite biti sigurni da je sve ispravno

reloading.heading: Ponovno učitavanje konfiguracije
reloading.introduction: Neki dijelovi programa Home Assistant mogu se ponovno učitati bez potrebe za ponovnim pokretanjem. Pritiskom na ponovno učitavanje učitava se nova konfiguracija.

server_management.heading: Upravljanje poslužiteljem
server_management.confirm_stop: Jeste li sigurni da želite zaustaviti Home Assostant?
